remarks: The collection of hereditarily size-limited well-founded sets comprise a set.  The proof is that of Randall Holmes at ~ http://math.boisestate.edu/~~holmes/holmes/hereditary.pdf , with modifications to use Hartogs' theorem instead of the weak variant (inconsequentially weakening some intermediate results), and making the well-foundedness condition explicit to avoid a direct dependence on ~ ax-reg .  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 14-Feb-2015.)
